mapper.select: SELECT ui.id, ui.user_base_id AS "userBaseId", ui.`status`, u.phone_no AS "phone" FROM t_user_info ui LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.id = ui.user_base_id WHERE ui.openid = #{openid} AND ui.user_type = #{userType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_info( user_base_id, openid, user_type, `status`, user_name, pwd, subscribe_scene, create_date ) SELECT #{userBaseId}, #{openid}, #{userType}, 0, #{userName}, #{pwd}, #{subscribeScene}, NOW() FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT id FROM t_user_info WHERE `openid` = #{openid} AND user_type = #{userType})
mapper.update: update t_user_info ui,(select openid,user_type from t_user_info where id = #{userInfoId}) uii set ui.openid = uii.openid, ui.user_type = 0 where ui.id = #{userId}
